original_text: Then the high priest rent his clothes, and saith, What need we any further witnesses?
korean_text: 대제사장이 자기 옷을 찢으며 이르되 우리가 어찌 더 증인을 요구하리요

sentences.original_text: Then the high priest rent his clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 그 때 대제사장이 자기 옷을 찢었고

sentences.original_text: What need we any further witnesses?
